name: Vegan Cajeta Envinada
description: Vegan Cajeta Envinada, Mexican milk caramel used to top everything from churros, crepes, ice cream, and more.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large heavy bottomed pot combine the soy milk, sugar, agave, vanilla, and baking soda.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large heavy bottomed pot combine the soy milk, sugar, agave, vanilla, and baking soda.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring to a slow simmer, and let simmer for 1 hour and 15 min. Stirring frequently to prevent sticking and burning.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring to a slow simmer, and let simmer for 1 hour and 15 min. Stirring frequently to prevent sticking and burning.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the brandy and simmer for 15 more minutes or until the cajeta has reached the desired consistency.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the brandy and simmer for 15 more minutes or until the cajeta has reached the desired consistency.

keywords: dulce de leche, leche quemada, whiskey
